definitions.definition: Distant from the lives and everyday concerns of ordinary people; esoteric , exclusive , select .
examples: Philosophical debates can be quite rarefied .

definitions.definition: Elevated in style or nature, sublime ; of high intellectual or moral value.

examples: The air at high altitudes at the top of mountains is rarefied .

main_definition: Distant from the lives and everyday concerns of ordinary people; esoteric , exclusive , select .
secondary_definitions: Elevated in style or nature, sublime ; of high intellectual or moral value.
( of a gas etc. ) Less dense than usual; thin .
